local_intent: Perceive white_plate, execute precise approach and alignment (tolerance 0.005), perform pick using existing white_plate_grasp (with retry), verify grasp stability.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose has previously written white_plate_grasp to the blackboard
white_plate is visible from frame_03 for detection and alignment
gripper is open and operational prior to pick
coherence_with_global: Implements the active ApproachAndAlign micro-goal from GLOBAL_BT: ensures perception -> precise approach/align -> pick -> verify (matches GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION stepwise plan and failure/retry guidance).
